article.description: Stephen F. Austin 73, Sam Houston St. 72
article.headline: Stephen F. Austin 73, Sam Houston St. 72
article.linkText: Stephen F. Austin 73, Sam Houston St. 72
article.story: HUNTSVILLE, Texas (AP) -- Josh Alexander hit a 3-pointer with 11 seconds left to give Stephen F. Austin a 73-72 win over Sam Houston State on Saturday. Antuane Miller had 21 points and nine rebounds for the Lumberjacks (16-11, 9-7 Southland). Anthony Paez added 17, and Marcus Clark had 10. The Lumberjacks led 36-26 at the half but allowed a 16-0 run by the Bearkats late in the second half. John Gardiner capped the run with a layup that put the Bearkats ahead 72-70 with 47 seconds left in the game. But Jejaun Plair missed a layup with one second remaining after Alexander's winning 3-pointer. Ryan Bright had 19 points and six rebounds for the Bearkats (20-8, 11-5). Plair finished with 14 points, and Jeremy Thomas came off the bench to score 11, including a pair of 3-pointers.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
